sentences: Author & Punisher is a one-man band from San Diego, formed in January 2004 by mechanical engineer and artist Tristan Shone.
Shone has released eight albums as Author & Punisher; Melk En Honing (2015) and Pressure Mine (2017) were released on Phil Anselmo's record label Housecore Records.
His latest, Beastland, was released by Relapse Records on October 5, 2018.
